title: Happily ever after
creator_credit: John Honey and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: A dramatization of wife bashing. A young couple are about to be married. The young man spends the night at a buck’s party and the girl plays party games. The parents have a celebration dinner which ends in a wife-bashing session.
